title: James Faiva
text:
James Nunu Fainga'anuku Faiva (born 13 June 1994) is a <a href="Tongan%20people">Tongan</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who generally plays as a <a href="fly-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">fly half</a> represents <a href="Tonga%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Tonga</a> internationally. He was included in the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup%20squads">Tongan squad</a> for the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2019 Rugby World Cup</a> which is held in Japan for the first time and also marks his first World Cup appearance.
Career.
He made his international debut for Tonga against <a href="Samoa%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Samoa</a> on 27 July 2019.
